mapper.select: SELECT userSource name, count(*) value FROM sys_user where userSource != 'System' group by userSource
select case when char_length(title) > 15 then concat(substr(title , 1 , 15) , '...') else title end name , visitsNumber value from blog_article order by ifnull(visitsNumber,0) desc limit 8
SELECT count(*) FROM sys_comment a WHERE a.moduleKey = 'Article' AND a.dataStatus = 'USABLE'
SELECT a.tag name , (SELECT COUNT(*) counts FROM blog_tag_article b WHERE b.tagId = a.id) value FROM blog_tag a ORDER BY a.sortOrder ASC
